tips__distance_tip: Keep a distance of at least 1 meter from people, especially if they have a cough, runny nose and fever. When staying indoors, additional distance must be observed. The further away you stay, the safer.
tips__wear_mask: Get into the habit of wearing a mask in public places. Masks must be properly used, stored, handled and disposed of in order to maximize their effectiveness.
tips__clean_hands: Clean your hands regularly with alcohol-based hand rub or wash them with soap and water. This measure will eliminate possible microbial contamination of hands, including viral ones.
sqflite_sp_list_length: Points saved for SQFLite & Shared Preferences:
